title: Simplify the Payout registration process for non US developers!
body: The current process is very lengthy and costly for non US developers. Why can't Microsoft simplify it? Make it similar if not the same as Google!?!?!

comments.body: I totally agree you should make it simplier for us no US developers, all my apps are free because of all complicated paperwork and I will not develop paid apps until this is change. You should make this process more localized.
